thig7.1:2.1: Apply yourself to the teaching of the Buddha,
thig7.1:2.2: and there will be no regrets.
thig7.1:3.2: a well collected and one-pointed mind,
thig7.1:3.4: as alien, and not as yourself."
thig7.1:4.4: I sat down on one side.
thig7.1:5.1: In the first watch of the night,
thig7.1:5.3: In the second watch of the night,
thig7.1:6.1: In the third watch of the night,
thig7.1:6.2: I destroyed this mass of darkness.
thig7.1:6.3: I emerged from that possessing three superhuman knowledges,
thig7.1:7.1: Like the thirty Devas with Sakka,
thig7.1:7.4: possessing three superhuman knowledges, free from corruptions."
